entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
